MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa is still ongoing. This is due to access difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.50pm on Wednesday 27th January 2021.
